sources.title: Live Now - Pay Later
sources.description: Title: Live Now - Pay Later Summary: Albert is a cheerful, unscrupulous "tally-man", a door-to-door salesman who cons housewives into buying things they don't need on the installment plan. He's happy - until he begins to fall in love. Directed by: Jay Lewis Actors: Ian Hendry, June Ritchie, John Gregson Production Company: Woodland Release Date: 25 October 1962 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Albert is a cheerful, unscrupulous "tally-man", a door-to-door salesman who cons housewives into buying things they don't need on the installment plan. He's happy - until he begins to fall in love.
